name: Retro Snake Game
description: Classic snake game with Windows XP styling. Navigate the snake to collect food and grow longer without hitting the walls or yourself.

name: Pixel Tetris
description: A nostalgic Tetris implementation with retro graphics and sound effects that will take you back to the golden age of gaming.

name: Space Invaders XP
description: Defend Earth from alien invasion in this Windows XP themed space shooter with classic arcade gameplay.

name: Minesweeper Classic
description: The iconic Windows Minesweeper game recreated with authentic XP styling and gameplay mechanics.

name: Pong Championship
description: Two-player Pong game with AI opponent and tournament mode. Perfect for quick gaming sessions.

name: Breakout Deluxe
description: Enhanced version of the classic Breakout game with power-ups, multiple levels, and stunning visual effects.

name: Pac-Man Retro
description: The legendary maze game with authentic sounds, ghost AI, and multiple difficulty levels.

name: Memory Match
description: Brain training memory game with various difficulty levels and Windows XP themed card designs.
